info.name: KickassTorrents Community - Midnight | KATcr.co
info.description: Dark theme for the new KickassTorrents community site. Tried to make the style and site layout similar to the original site and my userstyle. Done some improvements and tweaks.
info.additionalInfo:
Contact info: ... You need an add-on called Stylish to use custom styles: Firefox - https://addons.mozilla.org/en-GB/firefox/addon/stylish/ Chrome - https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/stylish/fjnbnpbmkenffdnngjfgmeleoegfcffe _____________________________________________________________________________________ Changelog: Update 01.10.16, 29.09.16, 26.09.16
  • Hidden more static-ads.
Update 27.08.16
  • Fixed the broken header and forum posts.
  • Changed the user online/offline indicator. The icon is now generated by the CSS. Also made a 2px spacing between the icon and the username.
  • Increased the poster's forum statistics font-size to 12px.
  • Increased the forum table font-size to 12px.
Update 13.08.16
  • $execute(order66);
  • Fixed cascade precedence.
Update 02.08.16
  • a.navPages:hover, .buttonlist ul li a:hover, #preview_body, h3.catbg a:hover, h4.catbg a:hover, .table_list tbody.header td a:hover Color set to #fff.
  • .quoteheader set to color #999 when user is unspecified.
